summary: An unlikely romance brews between a tough-acting thug with a tender heart, and a recently single, IT consultant neighbor, in this lighthearted and wacky twist of a romantic comedy.
cast: Vijay Sethupathi|Madonna Sebastian|Samuthirakani|G.M. Sundar|Ramesh Thilak|Manas Bhaskaran|Manikandan
title: Kadhalum Kadanthu Pogum
